item.description:
OK all -- I decided to switch this to August since certain people cannot go in July who I'd really like to include! :)

A float down the Farmington River!
We'll gather at the rental spot in the park at 1.00.

The tube & vest rental and ride back to the parking lot cost 20$ altogether, but if we have 10 or more people it's less.
Bring cash, since they only take cash.

Hopefully this will be a hot, beautiful day :D If you'd like to know more about it and read a review:

http://gonewengland.a...

The website for the company that rents the tubes is here, along with directions: http://www.farmington...
item.how_to_find_us: We'll gather at the place they rent the tubes at 1.00.

group.name: The NorthEast Connecticut Friends Meetup Group

item.name: Tubing on the Farmington River
